stories.title: Playwright Test Automation
stories.summary: Created a complete E2E testing framework integrated with GitHub Actions.
stories.details: Automated end-to-end tests for saucedemo.com, including screenshots, traces and CI/CD integration.

stories.title: ERP Mini System with JavaFX
stories.summary: Developed a modular warehouse management system.
stories.details: GUI built with JavaFX, persistent storage using MariaDB and SQLite, structured OOP design with MVC.

stories.title: API Test Automation with Postman
stories.summary: Integrated automated API tests into CI/CD pipelines.
stories.details: Postman Collections executed with Newman via GitHub Actions, HTML reports and version control through Git.
